creditline: Gift of Juliann McGuire and Michael McGuire
description: open sides; top central opening on seam for head; rust, brown and green stripes; bottom edge has four bands of multicolored flower designs; warp faced plain weave with supplementary warp weave at warp edges
inscription:
Inscription

embroidered vertically in yellow at one shoulder: [MARIO MONTALVO]
title: Man's poncho
